Blog.post: rainy days always make me feel lazy... *yawn* buti na lang i'm not in my hyper mood or i would've gotten pissed na naman sa techpoint (where the office bought my pc). eng eng kasi mga tao, i told them i wanted a P4 last year and the darn pc that arrived was a stoooppppid celeron 2.0GHz. ayan tuloy! wa pang one year, malapit na bumigay! (di pa ko hyper inis nito ha?) stupid processor can't handle the stress i put it through hahaha 0rpm na ang CPU fan speed when i checked hardware monitor a while ago. buti napansin ko ang init. i thought napapraning lang ako when i felt the cpu tower was hot....di pala! maybe if the weather gets better tomorrow, i might make talak our purchasing why they bought a stoooopid celeron. *yawn*

oo na! mababaw na ako! i just don't like it when people do this. yes, it is my pet peeve. i can't help it. i was born this way. some PM here borrowed my pencil kasi gagamitin daw ng director. kanina pa yun. when i checked again, they're both gone...with my pencil! i'm so attached pa naman to that pencil...it's my favorite. it's a rotring 0.5 mechanical pencil. it's only my second rotring in 10 years. my first just gave up on me. ganon! and i just can't accept na mawawala lang itong isa dahil sa kagagahan ng PM na ito! burarang old maid yun! pweeehh! leche!! grrr.... i'm so inis! *murmur* *grumble*

i was already on my way home.. naharang pa talaga grrr! now i have to make like a PM (production manager) and baby these agency people. what they need and what they want to eat and do what all the yayas do! it's not even my job! darn probonos!.... hate it, hate all probonos!! grabe probono na nga, kami pa magpapakain. ginagawang cafeteria ang aming office! grabe! bisyo na toooo! on the other hand, at least i get to order their food....i get to choose what i want to eat and magtiis sila!! i can choose very spicy and hot food for them and none of those for me!! yay! bwahahahaha aaahhh! revenge is sweet.... i wonder what time i'll be going home tonight...
nyaiks! pareho pa kami ni phillip ng template na ginamit... same artistic taste? (ganon?) :) fannnneeeeeeeeeeeeeee!

what do you do to relax? because i can't seem to do that nowadays... it's like i'm always harrassed (tama ba spelling? cute kasi ako kaya bobo sa spelling eh) and stressed out whether i'm in the office, at home or even in church. they say that one sign of stress is falling hair? is that true? siguro, kasi grabe maglagas ang hair ko this past year. numinipis na nga ang hair ko...had those bald patches about a year ago...scared the hell out of me!! (i was like "my hair!!!" and also "yoko makalbo!") tumubo naman sila ulit thank god! but today.... mygas! i discovered one very tiny patch again near my puyo....my goodness! go buy na naman ako ng minoxidil nyan! so expensive pa naman!! halp! what do you do to relax? 1. take a looonnnggg leave of absence and turn off your cellphone so no one can reach you? 2. ask for a transfer to another less stressful department? or 3. find another less stressful job altogether? after those three choices above, the issue now would be that: 1. i like where i'm at now (mga tao lang ang pampastress eh) 2. dyahe sa owner ng company because i know them personally and i love them haaayy!!
i'm having migraine attack! waaaah! sakit ng mata at ulo ko... boohoo sana di nalang ako pumasok... *groan*
Ability is what you're capable of doing... Motivation determines what you do... Attitude determines how well you do it.
Knowledge is of two kinds: 1. We know a subject ourselves, or 2. We know where we can find information upon it. (Samuel Johnson)
i had an inspiration for my web logs... i'll post stuff that i, personally, can apply to me... para naman may silbi itong mga blogs ko kunyari bwehehehe

woohoo! finally they got to my yahoo account na! sus ang tagal kong hinintay maging 100MB yung account ko ah...i thought nakalimutan nila ako.. lagi kasing huli yung account ko pag nag uupgrade sila... *sigh* wooheeee!!! flip binago ko na ang template ko ah....

para naman hindi puro reklamo na lang ang posts ko dito... looking forward to my weekend...kahit sunday na lang ang natitira... i will make the most of it..like watch two movies tomorrow! woooheeee! *adik* *adik* hehehe

as i was reviewing my web logs.. syempre ang nakita ko puro reklamo.... ayos pala ang suggestion mo flip eh! kakatanggal nga ng stress ito! pero syet silang lahat talaga! SYEEEEEEEEEEEEEEETTTTTTTTTTTTTT!!!!!!!!!! *sigh*

syet na malagket! kung kelan talaga paalis ka na't lahat lahat...saka ka pa uutusan ng kung ano ano na pwede naman sa lunes na lang diba? footah eh sabado ngayon ah! dapat half day lang ako, footah anong oras na?! kahit kelan talaga tong EP na to...walang considerasyon sa oras! ultimong kahimbingan ng tulog mo uutusan ka! hindi na to makatarungan!! poootttaahhh!!

sa pagkakakilala nyo sa akin... pikon ba ko? do i have a short temper? this girl in accounting...nakakapikon talaga grr... palagay ko inggit lang sya kasi di sya nakaka-talent fee, kami pwede... grabe talaga... pati overtime ko binabaril eh kung isumbong ko kaya sya na for how many years...overtime daw sya every saturday? when in fact, pedicure, manicure at baby sitting lang ang ginagawa sa taas at laro laro ng games? will i feel better if i told the big boss that? para di na sya payagan mag overtime pag sabado? *oohh i feel so wicked right now* gusto ko na text bossing ko! i'm fighting the urge to do so... *deep breaths* *counting 1-1000* *sigh*
hay.... call me that these days... been staying in the office late since monday night... haayyyy *yawn* ]
